input.sentences: the lake was large and reflective .
the tress made an interesting reflection on the water as we walked .
the old wind machine had not been used in many years .
the beautiful estate was offset perfectly by the owners many animals .
output.sentences: The lake is absolutely gorgeous today.
I love the way those trees are reflected in the water.
I really love the way the mountains are reflected in the water!
Whoa, that windmill sure isn't  going to work very well laying on the ground like that!
I think we have been transported to 'castle land'!!
